Context:
To reset a password for an account with George Brown College, follow these steps:

1. Enter your student or employee ID number in the User ID field without "@georgebrown.ca".
2. Disable and delete stored passwords on various devices before resetting the password.
3. Use the Forgot Password link to reset your password if unable to log in, using the email address used for registration.
4. Log in using your User ID (student or employee number) and current password.
5. Change your password by clicking "Change Password" on the self-serve menu.
6. Enter your current password and new identical password twice.
7. Click "OK" to submit the request. The password change typically takes a few seconds but can take up to a minute.
8. Check the status of the request by clicking "View My Requests".
9. Exit from the browser for security reasons after logging off.

This text does not provide any factual information related to programs offered by George Brown College.
